title: Colon Control-7
treatment_protocol_ch1: DSS of an average molecular weight of 36,000–50,000 (MP Biomedicals) was administered to 8-week-old female C57BL/6 mice at a concentration of 2% (w/v) in drinking water. 2-DG (10 mg/mouse; Sigma-Aldrich) was injected intraperitoneally once a day.  Control mice were treated similarly, with drinking water without DSS, and intraperitoneal injection of PBS without 2-DG
extract_protocol_ch1: RNeasy Mini Kit of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 250 ng total RNA as described in GeneChip® WT Terminal Labeling Kit (Affymetorix).
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized. See hybridization protocol described in the manual of the Affymetrix GeneChip® 3'IVT Express Kit . GeneChips were washed and stained in GeneChip Hybridization, Wash, and Stain Kit.
data_processing: The data were analyzed with Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console Software (AGCC) and Affymetrix Expression Console Software(Expression Console)
